reviewText: Jenny begins the DVD by reading a book (fully clothed). Unfortunately, her skin begins to itch. She tries to keep reading while scratching at the itchy spots. This does not bring Jenny satisfaction as she stops reading and grabs the bottle of skin moisturizer. She begins treating her skin by applying the moisturizer to her exposed areas - her arms and her stomach. However, Jenny has more itchy spots that are not so easily accessible, so she starts removing her clothes. She begins by pulling her jeans down to her knees and applies the moisturizer to her thighs. She lifts her shirt and applies the moisturizer to her breasts. Then, she rolls over, onto her stomach, and applies the moisturizer to her back - as well as sliding her hands underneath her pink underwear, to apply some moisturizer to her butt. She rolls over again, onto her back, and continues to rub her breasts (there are several, very nice, close-ups of her breasts as she rubs them!) and stomach (she even slides her hand underneath her underwear to rub her crotch). She pulls her underwear down to her knees as she continues to rub her thighs and breasts. She rolls over again, onto her stomach, and rubs her back and (now bare and VERY cute) butt. (As she rubs her butt, the camera provides a nice close view.) Rolling onto her back, again, she continues to rub her breasts, as well as her crotch. (The camera provides a few close-ups of her crotch.) Finally, she removes all of her clothes. She gives her breasts, and crotch, a few more rubs as she falls asleep, nude, on the couch. Included in this DVD is a Bonus Scene, titled "Cook Better Naked"! Jenny starts this scene in a shirt and underwear. After explaining what she will be doing (That's right, fans of Jenny, you'll hear her beautiful voice in this clip!), she takes off her clothes and puts on an apron. She fixes mixing the dough, takes off the apron, and cleans the table. This short clip does provide a few nice views of Jenny's breasts as well as several nice views of Jenny's cute butt! The main feature of this DVD runs for, about, 67 minutes, while the Bonus Scene runs for 3 minutes (for a total of 70 minutes). The main feature contains quite a few close-ups of Jenny's breasts, as well as a few close-ups of her crotch and butt. The Bonus Scene provides a few more good views of her (cute) butt. While there were several close-ups throughout the main feature, I believe there were more close-ups in Jenny's other DVD, Happy NAKED Birthday. To sum up this DVD: I LOVED IT! As always, Jenny is so confident being nude in front of the camera. Her confidence is EASILY seen in the Bonus Scene, as she talks into the camera and takes off her clothes - all while giving us a beautiful (and VERY CONFIDENT) smile!!! I would DEFINITELY recommend this DVD to: - ANY fans of Jenny - ANY fans of Rusty Nail Productions - Anyone who loves to watch a very beautiful, and self-confident, woman, who takes off all of her clothes.

Boy.

Is this video a real rip off.  All the stupid woman does is rub herself with a simple lotion.  Hell anybody can do that.  I thought it would be a demonstration of how to deal with dry skin during winter time.  What a royal rip off!
